Parameters: AdapterView: The AdapterView where the click happened.
View: The view within the AdapterView that was clicked (this will be a view provided by the adapter)
int: The position of the view in the adapter.
long: The row id of the item that was clicked.
onItemClick(android.widget.AdapterView<?.Description: Callback method to be invoked when an item in this AdapterView has been clicked. Implementers can call getItemAtPosition(position) if they need to access the data associated with the selected item.
onItemClick(android.widget.AdapterView<?.FullName: public abstract void onItemClick (AdapterView<?> parent, View view, int position, long id)

ClassDesc: Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when an item in this AdapterView has been clicked.
